content.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
content.description: Will mark all datavaults with navigation beacons.
content.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: Marquera toutes les chambres fortes de données avec des balises de navigation.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: Marcará todas las bóvedas de datos con balizas de navegación.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: Segnerà tutti i depositi dati con boe di navigazione.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: Will mark all datavaults with navigation beacons.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: Oznaczy wszystkie skrytki danych za pomocą boi nawigacyjnych.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: Marcará todos os cofres de dados com bóias de navegação.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: ナビゲーションビーコンを使用してすべてのデータヴォールトにマークします。
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: 모든 데이터 볼트를 네비게이션 비컨으로 표시합니다.
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: 用导航信标标记所有数据保险库。
text.author: JanPanthera

text.name: JP_DataVaultExplorer
text.description: 用導航信標標記所有數據保險庫。
text.author: JanPanthera
